reviews.review_msg: Very engaging lectures and a very interesting final project. Make sure to choose a good team because you'll be working with them for the entire term.

Feyza is hands down one of the best instructors at SFU.  At first I thought it was strange how everything was "gamified".  BUT!  She was absolutely hilarious, engaging, dedicated and informative.  I absolutely loved her and the course!  Would recommend!!!

Feyza is extremely intelligent and she makes learning fun with her course design. Expectations for the course were set very early on, and she stayed consistent throughout the semester. I love how encouraging she was and the final project hackathon was a great way to test our knowledge.
She is a good instructor, given the clear instructions and amazing lectures for each week
